      • openStackAuthenticate

        public boolean openStackAuthenticate()

      • createVM

        public VmInfo createVM(long userid,
                       long memory,
                       int numCore,
                       int disk,
                       int helperVmNum)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        This function creates a VM for libvirt, allocating resources according to the parameters.
        Parameters:
        userid - user ID obtained from the DS.
        memory - requested memory size in KB.
        numCore - requested number of cores.
        disk - requested disk size in MB.
        helperVmNum - helper VM number (1 or 2). If the created VM is a normal VM, this parameter should be 0.
        Returns:
        VM information object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createVM

        public VmInfo createVM(long userid,
                       java.lang.String flavorId,
                       int helperVmNum)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        This function creates a VM for openstack, allocating resources according to the parameters.
        Parameters:
        userid - user ID obtained from the DS.
        flavorId - flavorId defined in the openstack infrastructure.
        helperVmNum - helper VM number (1 or 2). If the created VM is a normal VM, this parameter should be 0.
        Returns:
        VM information object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • suspendVM

        public boolean suspendVM(long userid)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        This function suspends the VM based on the user ID.
        Parameters:
        userid - user ID obtained from the DS.
        Returns:
        a boolean value that returns success or fail.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • resumeVM

        public boolean resumeVM(long userid)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        This function resumes the suspended VM based on the user ID.
        Parameters:
        userid - user ID obtained from the DS.
        Returns:
        a boolean value that returns success or fail.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
